improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error. Add check to ensure y is not zero before dividing x by y.
Unreachable code path. The condition `x % 2` will always be false when x is calculated as 4 * i + y * (z) because the result is always even. Remove the dead code.

Simplification. The variable z is initialized to 3 and never changes within the loop.  The multiplication of y * z could be simplified since y mostly takes values of 4 and the multiplication by 3 is also redundant.
